title: The National Arboretum
brief_description: The National Arboretum near Washington, is a living museum, housing the national collection of trees, shrubs and flowers in 415 acres of landscaped gardens. It is a plant library, herbarium and as well it develops new varieties which are made available to other arboretums and plant farms throughout America.
